alert.note: Alert for Southern Columbia; Union; Western Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 6:37PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN ALACHUA... SOUTHWESTERN UNION AND SOUTH CENTRAL COLUMBIA COUNTIES THROUGH 730 PM EDT... At 637 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near High Springs, or 10 miles southeast of Ichetucknee Spring, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph, pea size hail, and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Worthington Spring, High Springs, Worthington Springs, Upland Pines, Providence, and Dukes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
